descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=7][color=#c00000][font=Impact]Me love Amazon woman. Big. Good. Small. Bad. Right now get! Play! Make very happyfulness.  DEATH METAL!!![/font][/color][/SIZE]
[line]
[size=5][font=Century Gothic][color=#ffffff]Bodyslide Preset.  For CBBE Body (Curvy).   All other exclusions may apply.  Batteries not included.  Additional outfits sold separately.   See store for more details.  This product is not yet rated.  Viewer discretion is advised.
[line]

[img]http://orig04.deviantart.net/43f5/f/2016/132/a/b/just_dance_0_by_craigdkilner-da29c3w.gif[/img]
[/color][/font][/size]
[line]
How to:

Bodyslide presets like this one are used by applying specifically to the correct body, in this case, Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition (CBBE) found here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] utilized in conjuction with the Bodyslide program found here:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide & Outfit Studio[/url].
MOST IMPORTANT:  For "dat bounce" and "dat jiggle".  You will also need:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT TBBP BBP[/url] and also:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url], oh and also:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url], and... waitaminute, I forgot you also will need this:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32[/url].  I think that was it.  I'm not sure.  Honestly, I got all of my stuff to work by sheer luck, I'm not even joking so go follow this tutorial instead:  [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/24907-get-a-customized-jiggly-female-player-char-with-body-physics-from-scratch-cbbe-tbbp-hdt/]Link[/url].
And believe me, you will want to do all of this!

[line]
Installation:

Please note the options used from CBBE are the Curvy options.  After installing the required programs above, download and install this mod.  This file is already designed to go into the correct folder if downloaded with any mod manager.  Open the program called Bodyslide (found in your Skyrim Directory --> Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide, next, in the Bodyslide window select AmazinAmazon by clicking on the "Preset" bar in the top left then click on "Build" at the bottom to apply to all dem ladies in Skyrim.  OMG!  That reminds me, you need to use this:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19730/?]Consistent Older People[/url]!!!!!  Boy, that would've been disastrous.  

[line]
Matching armor and clothing to any bodyslide preset:  

In order to correct armors and clothing for this bodyslide preset, do a search for "CBBE Bodyslide HDT" on all of the internets provided to you from all over the world.  Remember that in order for the armors to "fit" you must then utilize said bodyslide program again.  Here's a tutorial to get you started:  [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1324094-unofficial-bodyslide-2outfit-studio-tutorials/]Bodyslide Help[/url].  
The most useful tip I find is to keep in mind that armor mods must have four important elements:  
1.) A mesh folder for the, uh, armor's meshes.  
2.) A textures folder for the, uhm, what was it?  Oh, oh yeah, it's for the armor's textures. 
3.) A CalienteTools folder for the bodyslide files for, you know, to properly conform the armor to the body.
4.) An esp file (also known as .esp file extension) to be added to your Skyrim Data folder so you can activate it with your favorite mod manager thereby allowing the armor to show up in game.
Why this tip helpful:  Sometimes these miscellaneous folders from these miscellaneous armor mods made by miscellaneous people don't go into the correct places in your Skyrim directory, so ensure that they do by manually dragging and dropping them to where they need to be if necessary.  

[line]
Be sure to endorse those other mod authors because without them this most amazin of Amazon mods would not be possible.  I didn't do hardly any work except be a huge perv as any indication of this mod might point to.

[line]
Skin textures used are from Demoniac:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Found here[/url]
ENB is Tetrachromatic ENB:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73848/?]Found here[/url]

[line]
Don't forget to listen to Death Metal and eat meat.  Also, don't play scary games at night by yourself, that's just a bad idea no matter how you look at it.  And follow your heart and your dreams!  Definitely use this mod as inspiration and guidance!
author: craigdkilner
